channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NFL Injury Report Week 15: Commanders, Raiders, Jets Without Starting QB
item.description: Here's who's in and who's out in Week 15 of the NFL season.

item.title: Heisman Trophy Ballot Results: Indiana's Fernando Mendoza Wins In Landslide
item.description: The voting results for this year's Heisman Trophy race are in following Indiana QB Fernando Mendoza's historic victory.

item.title: Azzi Fudd Leads No. 1 UConn's Rout of No. 16 USC With JuJu Watkins Sidelined
item.description: Azzi Fudd scored 17 points and No. 1 UConn routed 16th-ranked USC on Saturday night, 79-51.

item.title: Yaxel Lendeborg's Big Game Helps No. 2 Michigan Stay Unbeaten In Win vs. Maryland
item.description: Yaxel Lendeborg had 29 points, and No. 2 Michigan rallied from a nine-point deficit Saturday night to defeat Maryland.

item.title: No. 9 Oklahoma Defeats No. 23 Oklahoma State 92-70 for 10th Consecutive Win
item.description: Raegan Beers scored 22 points and grabbed 12 rebounds in No. 9 Oklahoma's 92-70 win over No. 23 Oklahoma State.

item.title: Wemby, Spurs shock Thunder to advance in Cup
item.description: Victor Wembanyama made an impact in limited minutes as the French phenom led the Spurs to a stunning victory over the Thunder to make the NBA Cup fina...

item.title: Way-too-early 2026 Heisman watch: 15 players who could win the award
item.description: We size up next year's most likely candidates for college football's highest individual honor.

item.title: A reason (or two) to watch every one of this season's bowl games
item.description: With first-year success stories, chances at redemption and general silliness, college football bowl season always delivers.

item.title: QB Mendoza first Hoosier to win Heisman Trophy
item.description: Indiana's Fernando Mendoza, who guided the Hoosiers to their first No. 1 ranking and the top seed in the 12-team CFP bracket after throwing for 2,980 ...

item.title: John Cena takes his last bow at WWE Saturday Night's Main Event
item.description: After sending John Cena out on a loss, Gunther has a new 'legend killer' nickname, and young talent shines.
